title: Mahathir Mohamad Fast Facts | KRDO
snippet: By CNN Newssource · December 13, 2023 2:17 PM · Published December 10, 2025 11:26 AM · CNN Editorial Research · (CNN) — Here is a look at Mahathir Mohamad, former prime minister of Malaysia. Birth date: July 10, 1925 (officially recorded as December 20, 1925) Birth place: Alor Setar, Kedah ·

title: Mahathir Mohamad Fast Facts - KESQ
snippet: October 15, 2024 – According to his office, Mahathir is admitted to the hospital to treat a respiratory infection. July 13, 2025 – Is discharged from the hospital after being admitted for fatigue, following a birthday celebration.

title: Mahathir Mohamad Fast Facts | CNN
snippet: Updated 1:26 PM EST, Wed December 10, 2025 · Link Copied! Former Malaysian prime minister Mahathir bin Mohamad arrives to hold a dialogue session in the 20th International Conference on the Future of Asia in Tokyo on May 22, 2014. The two-day conference was held with the theme of "Rising Asia - Messages for the Next 20 Years."

title: Mahathir Mohamad | AP News
snippet: Former Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad marked a historic milestone as he turned 100.

title: Mahathir Calls For Full Disclosure On Alleged Defense Agreement Signed With US
snippet: December 12, 2025 · Share · Facebook ... Mohamad has called on the Government to fully disclose details of a reported new defence cooperation agreement allegedly signed between Malaysia and the United States, warning that withholding ...
